title: MTV 'Teen Mom' loses custody of twins, 5, to ex-husband
text:
Celebrity News Leah Messer has reportedly lost custody of her 5-year-old twin girls, Ali and Aleeah. Following a dramatic sixth season of Teen Mom 2, in which Leah Messer was accused of using drugs and being a bad parent, her ex-husband, Corey Simms, has reportedly been awarded primary custody of their two children.
See the full story at The Inquisitr News
